passages.text:
You are now in the school Atrium. There are many other rooms that you may enter. 

[[Go to cafeteria->Caferteria]]
[[Go to gymnasium->Gymnasium]]
[[Go to art room->Art Room]]
[[Go to music room->Music Room]]
[[Go to study room->Study Room]]
[[Go to math room->Math Room]]
[[Go to reading room->Reading Room]]
passages.name: School Atrium

passages.text:
You are now in the Caferteria. You may go back to the Atrium if you would no like to stay here

[[Go to atrium->School Atrium]]
passages.name: Caferteria

passages.text:
You are now in the gym. You may return back to the atrium.

[[Go to atrium->School Atrium]]
passages.name: Gymnasium

passages.text:
You are now in the art room. You may return to the atrium.

[[Go to atrium->School Atrium]]
passages.name: Art Room

passages.text:
You are now in the music room. You may return to the atrium.

[[Go to atrium->School Atrium]]
passages.name: Music Room

passages.text:
You are now in the study room. You may return back to the atrium.

[[Go to atrium->School Atrium]]
passages.name: Study Room

passages.text:
You are now in the math room. You may return back to the atrium.

[[Go to atrium->School Atrium]]
passages.name: Math Room

passages.text:
You are now in the reading room. You may return back to the atrium

[[Go to atrium->School Atrium]]
passages.name: Reading Room
